3 namespace Ubiquity\orm\creator;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\annotations\JoinColumnAnnotation;
6 use Ubiquity\cache\CacheManager;
7 use Ubiquity\controllers\Startup;
8 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UFileSystem;
9 
18 abstract class ModelsCreator {
19  protected $config;
20  protected $tables = array ();
21  protected $classes = array ();
22 
23  abstract protected function getTablesName();
24 
25  abstract protected function getFieldsInfos($tableName);
26 
27  abstract protected function getPrimaryKeys($tableName);
28 
29  abstract protected function getForeignKeys($tableName, $pkName);
30 
31  protected function init($config) {
32  $this->config = $config ["database"];
33  }
34 
35  public function create($config, $initCache = true, $singleTable = null) {
36  $this->init ( $config );
37  $modelsDir = Startup::getModelsCompletePath ();
38  if (UFileSystem::safeMkdir ( $modelsDir )) {
39  $this->tables = $this->getTablesName ();
40  CacheManager::checkCache ( $config );
41 
42  foreach ( $this->tables as $table ) {
43  $class = new Model ( $table, $config ["mvcNS"] ["models"] );
44  $fieldsInfos = $this->getFieldsInfos ( $table );
45  $keys = $this->getPrimaryKeys ( $table );
46  foreach ( $fieldsInfos as $field => $info ) {
47  $member = new Member ( $field );
48  if (in_array ( $field, $keys )) {
49  $member->setPrimary ();
50  }
51  $member->setDbType ( $info );
52  $member->addValidators ();
53  $class->addMember ( $member );
54  }
55  $this->classes [$table] = $class;
56  }
57  $this->createRelations ();
58  if (isset ( $singleTable )) {
59  $this->createOneClass ( $singleTable, $modelsDir );
60  } else {
61  foreach ( $this->classes as $table => $class ) {
62  $name = $class->getSimpleName ();
63  echo "Creating the {$name} class\n";
64  $this->writeFile ( $modelsDir . \DS . $name . ".php", $class );
65  }
66  }
67  if ($initCache === true) {
68  CacheManager::initCache ( $config, "models" );
69  }
70  }
71  }
72 
73  protected function createOneClass($singleTable, $modelsDir) {
74  if (isset ( $this->classes [$singleTable] )) {
75  $class = $this->classes [$singleTable];
76  echo "Creating the {$class->getName()} class\n";
77  $this->writeFile ( $modelsDir . \DS . $class->getSimpleName () . ".php", $class );
78  } else {
79  echo "The {$singleTable} table does not exist in the database\n";
80  }
81  }
82 
83  protected function createRelations() {
84  foreach ( $this->classes as $table => $class ) {
85  $keys = $this->getPrimaryKeys ( $table );
86  foreach ( $keys as $key ) {
87  $fks = $this->getForeignKeys ( $table, $key );
88  foreach ( $fks as $fk ) {
89  $field = \lcfirst ( $table );
90  $fkTable = $fk ["TABLE_NAME"];
91  $this->classes [$table]->addOneToMany ( \lcfirst ( $fkTable ) . "s", \lcfirst ( $table ), $this->classes [$fkTable]->getName () );
92  $this->classes [$fkTable]->addManyToOne ( $field, \lcfirst ( $fk ["COLUMN_NAME"] ), $class->getName () );
93  }
94  }
95  }
96  $this->createManyToMany ();
97  }
98 
99  protected function getTableName($classname) {
100  foreach ( $this->classes as $table => $class ) {
101  if ($class->getName () === $classname)
102  return $table;
103  }
104  $posSlash = strrpos ( $classname, '\\' );
105  $tablename = substr ( $classname, $posSlash + 1 );
106  return \lcfirst ( $tablename );
107  }
108 
109  protected function createManyToMany() {
110  foreach ( $this->classes as $table => $class ) {
111  if ($class->isAssociation () === true) {
112  $members = $class->getManyToOneMembers ();
113  if (sizeof ( $members ) == 2) {
114  $manyToOne1 = $members [0]->getManyToOne ();
115  $manyToOne2 = $members [1]->getManyToOne ();
116  $table1 = $this->getTableName ( $manyToOne1->className );
117  $table2 = $this->getTableName ( $manyToOne2->className );
118  $class1 = $this->classes [$table1];
119  $class2 = $this->classes [$table2];
120  $tableMember = \lcfirst ( $table ) . "s";
121  $table1Member = \lcfirst ( $table1 ) . "s";
122  $table2Member = \lcfirst ( $table2 ) . "s";
123  $joinTable1 = $this->getJoinTableArray ( $class1, $manyToOne1 );
124  $joinTable2 = $this->getJoinTableArray ( $class2, $manyToOne2 );
125  $class1->addManyToMany ( $table2Member, $manyToOne2->className, $table1Member, $table, $joinTable1, $joinTable2 );
126  $class1->removeMember ( $tableMember );
127 
128  $class2->addManyToMany ( $table1Member, $manyToOne1->className, $table2Member, $table, $joinTable2, $joinTable1 );
129  $class2->removeMember ( $tableMember );
130  unset ( $this->classes [$table] );
131  } else {
132  return;
133  }
134  }
135  }
136  }
137 
138  protected function getJoinTableArray(Model $class, JoinColumnAnnotation $joinColumn) {
139  $pk = $class->getPrimaryKey ();
140  $fk = $joinColumn->name;
141  $dFk = $class->getDefaultFk ();
142  if ($fk !== $dFk) {
143  if ($pk !== null && $fk !== null)
144  return [ "name" => $fk,"referencedColumnName" => $pk->getName () ];
145  }
146  return [ ];
147  }
148 
149  protected function writeFile($filename, $data) {
150  return file_put_contents ( $filename, $data );
151  }
152 }
